thread.title: BRIEF-Huntington Ingalls Industries Q4 Adjusted Earnings Per Share $3.11

title: BRIEF-Huntington Ingalls Industries Q4 Adjusted Earnings Per Share $3.11
text: February 15, 2018 / 12:23 PM / Updated 8 minutes ago BRIEF-Huntington Ingalls Industries Q4 Adjusted Earnings Per Share $3.11 Reuters Staff Feb 15 (Reuters) - Huntington Ingalls Industries Inc : * HUNTINGTON INGALLS INDUSTRIES REPORTS FOURTH QUARTER AND FULL YEAR 2017 RESULTS * Q4 ADJUSTED EARNINGS PER SHARE $3.11 * Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE $1.41 * Q4 REVENUE ROSE 3.9 PERCENT TO $2.0 BILLION * ‍NEW CONTRACT AWARDS FOR 2017 WERE ABOUT $8.1 BILLION, BRINGING TOTAL BACKLOG TO $21.4 BILLION AS OF DEC. 31, 2017​ * Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $2.94, REVENUE VIEW $1.94 BILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
